mapper.select:
/* USE : IostockCmmMapper.selectProdMomsList */
SELECT thp.PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 상품브랜드 선택일때
-- 상품브랜드 전체일때 AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD
SELECT tmp.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD

/* IostockCmmMapper.getUserBrandCdList */ SELECT LISTAGG(twub.HQ_BRAND_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY twub.HQ_BRAND_CD) AS HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND twub WHERE 1=1 AND twub.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY twub.USER_ID
